import React, { FormEvent, useState } from 'react' import { onLogin } from '../api/auth.api' const SignInForm: React.FunctionComponent = () => { const [{ username, password }, setCredentials] = useState({ username: '', password: '', }) const [error, setError] = useState('') const login = async (event: FormEvent) => { event.preventDefault() const response = await onLogin({ username, password, }) if (response && response.error) { setError(response.error) } } return (
setCredentials({ username: event.target.value, password })} type="text" className="flex-grow h-10 px-2 border rounded border-grey-400 focus:border-gray-700 focus:outline-none focus:shadow-outline" placeholder="Username" />
setCredentials({ username, password: event.target.value })} type="password" className="flex-grow h-10 px-2 rounded border border-grey-400 focus:border-gray-700 focus:outline-none focus:shadow-outline" placeholder="Password" />
Sign Up
{error.length > 0 &&

{error}

}
) } export default SignInForm
